#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
int main()
{
    int t,*arr,n,i,sum,count;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        count = 0;
        sum = 0;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        arr = (int *)malloc(n*sizeof(int));
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
            sum += arr[i];
        }
        sum = (sum%n) ? (sum/n)+1 : sum/n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(arr[i]!=sum)
                count += (abs)(arr[i]-sum);
        }
        printf("%d\n",count);
    }
    return 0;
}
